title: velocyto
description: Runs the velocity analysis on a BAM file, outputting a loom file.

Dataset input.title: Dataset input
Dataset input.description: Dataset input using nf-tower "dataset" or "data explorer". Allows for the input of multiple         parameter sets to initialise a Nextflow channel.

param_list.description: Dataset input can either be a list of maps, a csv file, a json file, a yaml file, or simply a yaml                 blob. The names of the input fields (e.g. csv columns, json keys) need to be an exact match with the workflow input parameters.

input.description: Type: `file`, required. Path to BAM file
input.help_text: Type: `file`, required. Path to BAM file

transcriptome.description: Type: `file`, required. Path to GTF file
transcriptome.help_text: Type: `file`, required. Path to GTF file

barcode.description: Type: `file`. Valid barcodes file, to filter the bam
barcode.help_text:
Type: `file`. Valid barcodes file, to filter the bam. If --bcfile is not specified all the cell barcodes will be included.
Cell barcodes should be specified in the bcfile as the 'CB' tag for each read

output.description: Type: `file`, required, default: `$id.$key.output.output`. Velocyto loom file
output.help_text: Type: `file`, required, default: `$id.$key.output.output`. Velocyto loom file

logic.description: Type: `string`, default: `Default`, choices: ``Default`, `Permissive10X`, `Intermediate10X`, `ValidatedIntrons10X`, `Stricter10X`, `ObservedSpanning10X`, `Discordant10X`, `SmartSeq2``. The logic to use for the filtering
logic.help_text: Type: `string`, default: `Default`, choices: ``Default`, `Permissive10X`, `Intermediate10X`, `ValidatedIntrons10X`, `Stricter10X`, `ObservedSpanning10X`, `Discordant10X`, `SmartSeq2``. The logic to use for the filtering.

nextflow input-output arguments.title: Nextflow input-output arguments
nextflow input-output arguments.description: Input/output parameters for Nextflow itself. Please note that both publishDir and publish_dir are supported but at least one has to be configured.

publish_dir.description: Type: `string`, required, example: `output/`. Path to an output directory
publish_dir.help_text: Type: `string`, required, example: `output/`. Path to an output directory.
